author: (Pat Evans)
title: Restaurants serve Grand Cocktail Competition
text: Restaurants serve Grand Cocktail Competition July 13, 2015 A A Related Articles Area bartenders compete in the Grand Cocktail Competition to win the People’s Choice award and judged awards. Photo via fb.com Bartenders from across the city are creating their most-imaginative drinks. The Grand Cocktail Competition kicked off this past weekend at 29 area restaurants, as bartenders and mixologists are competing to win the People’s Choice award. The competition runs through Aug. 4. There are two categories this year: most creative julep and most creative summer cocktail. The cocktails are to use Restaurant Week sponsors Woodford Reserve and Herradura Tequila. Votes can be cast at restruantweekgr.com , where all competing restaurants and their cocktail recipes can be found. Winners of the competition will receive a $100 gift certificate to the Secchia Institute for Culinary Education’s restaurant, The Heritage. The winners will be announced at an invitation-only judged competition at Gravity Restaurant on Aug. 5. Judged competition Judges will select first, second and third-place winners in both categories. The julep winner will receive a two day expenses-paid trip for two to Woodford Reserve, and the Herradura winner will receive $500. Bartenders Jenna Arcidiacono and Mike Post, Amore Trattoria Italiana Chris Lee Raab, Black Heron Kitchen and Bar Emily Tuttle, CitySen at CityFlatsHotel Steve Hulsebus, Cork Wine & Grille Josh Hamelt, Cygnus 27 Sean Spencer, Fajita Republic Cantina Melissa Dembny, FireRock Grille Josh Hallwachs, Grand Rapids Brewing Co. Michael Weinrich, Grand Woods Lounge Dave Zick, HopCat Tara VanderMolen, Licari’s Sicilian Pizza Kitchen Kim VanAlstine, Olive’s Julie Bonter, One Trick Pony Richard Green, Pearl Street Grill Laura Ringler, Pietros’s Nicole Hunter, Red’s on the River Katelyn Schanz, Rockwell Republic Chris Cathey, Rush Creek Bistro Zac Williams, Six.one.six Kevin Stanley and Brandon Wilcox, Stella’s Lounge Ryan Christian, Tavern on the Square Kevin Nunn, Terra GR
